1 namespace Fasetto.Word
2 {
3  using System.Threading.Tasks;
4  using System.Windows;
5  using System.Windows.Media.Animation;
6 
7  /// <summary>
8  /// Helpers to animate framework elements in specific ways
9  /// </summary>
10  public static class FrameworkElementAnimations
11  {
12  #region Public Methods
13 
14  /// <summary>
15  /// Slide and fade in from left.
16  /// </summary>
17  /// <param name="element">The element to animate.</param>
18  /// <param name="seconds">The seconds it takes to animate.</param>
19  /// <param name="keepMargin">Wether to keep the element at the same width during animation</param>
20  /// <returns>The <see cref="Task"/>.</returns>
21  public static async Task SlideAndFadeInFromLeftAsync(this FrameworkElement element, float seconds, bool keepMargin = true)
22  {
23  var sb = new Storyboard();
24  sb.AddSlideFromLeft(seconds, element.ActualWidth, keepMargin: keepMargin);
25  sb.AddFadeIn(seconds);
26  sb.Begin(element);
27  element.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
28  await Task.Delay((int)seconds * 1000);
29  }
30 
31  /// <summary>
32  /// Slide and fade in from right.
33  /// </summary>
34  /// <param name="element">The element to animate.</param>
35  /// <param name="seconds">The seconds it takes to animate.</param>
36  /// <param name="keepMargin">Wether to keep the element at the same width during animation</param>
37  /// <returns>The <see cref="Task"/>.</returns>
38  public static async Task SlideAndFadeInFromRightAsync(this FrameworkElement element, float seconds, bool keepMargin = true)
39  {
40  var sb = new Storyboard();
41  sb.AddSlideFromRight(seconds, element.ActualWidth, keepMargin: keepMargin);
42  sb.AddFadeIn(seconds);
43  sb.Begin(element);
44  element.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;
45  await Task.Delay((int)seconds * 1000);
46  }
47 
48  /// <summary>
49  /// Slide and fade out to Left
50  /// </summary>
51  /// <param name="element">The element to animate.</param>
52  /// <param name="seconds">The seconds it takes to animate.</param>
53  /// <param name="keepMargin">Wether to keep the element at the same width during animation</param>
54  /// <returns>The <see cref="Task"/>.</returns>
55  public static async Task SlideAndFadeOutToLeftAsync(this FrameworkElement element, float seconds, bool keepMargin = true)
56  {
57  var sb = new Storyboard();
58  sb.AddSlideToLeft(seconds, element.ActualWidth, keepMargin: keepMargin);
59  sb.AddFadeOut(seconds);
60  sb.Begin(element);
61  element.Visibility = Visibility.Visible;

63  }
64 
65  /// <summary>
